about_the_game:
About CORN

CORN is an interactive incremental game, in which you click on corn! Get random corn every few hours and grow your collection. Full steam inventory and market integration. Limited edition corn rotate in and out of the drop pool on a weekly basis. Special corn grant special effects. Buy corn, sell corn, collect corn, craft corn, love corn. Corn!

The goal of CORN? Get the counter to 340282346638528859811704183484516925440, the maximum value of a floating point number in C#, which will break the game. You can also try collecting every Corn. Good luck.

Created by the acclaimed developer of CUCKOLD SIMULATOR.

Why CORN?

Corn is a versatile crop that is widely used in various industries, mainly food production. Corn syrup, derived from corn, is a key component of many American delicacies, such as soda and cereal. Corn is heavily subsidized by the CIA, to the tune of over 9 billion dollars per year. Simply put, you can't go wrong with corn!

Features

  • Collect corn.

  • Buy corn.

  • Sell corn.

  • Craft corn.

  • Daily corn drops.

  • Corn is better than banana.

  • Participate in the e-corn-omy.

  • Increase your CP (Corn Power).

  • Compete to place on the global leaderboard.

  • Click corn, make funny number go up.

  • Special corn grant special effects.

  • Corn is in fact a fruit, stop trying to correct me.

name: CORN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: CORN — the interactive incremental game featuring America's favorite fruit, brought to you by the developer of CUCKOLD SIMULATOR. Buy corn, sell corn, collect corn, craft corn. We love corn!
